Feature: Comparisons between cultural behaviors in professional or social settings.
Parenting judgments based on behavior in public, particularly food choices.
Behavior-related assumptions about confrontation and passivity.
Implicit biases in determining attractiveness based on racial or ethnic background.
Parental roles and responsibilities inferred from casual observations.
Judgments on parenting quality related to gender and visible actions.
Assumptions about parental fitness based on eating habits or appearance.
